entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.2°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
